sourcesContent:
import React, { lazy,useContext,useEffect } from 'react' import { CBadge, CButton, CButtonGroup, CCard, CCardBody, CCardFooter, CCardHeader, CCol, CProgress, CRow, CCallout } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' import ProgrammeProvider from "../../context/ProgrammeContext" import AttendeeProvider from "../../context/AttendeeContext" import Paginations from "../../pagination/pagination" import SearchInput from "../../inputs/search-input" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faEye } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { faDownload } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import MainChartExample from '../charts/MainChartExample.js' import {useParams,useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' const styles={ noBorder:{ border:"none" }, noBorderTop:{ borderBTop:"none" }, cardStyle:{ boxShadow: " 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2)", transition: "0.3s", border:"none" } } const DashboardAttendeesUser = () => { const {id} =useParams() const {setCurrentPage,fetchAttendeesUserByProgrammeIdApi,pagination,attendees,attendee}=useContext(AttendeeProvider.Context) useEffect(()=>{ fetchAttendeesUserByProgrammeIdApi(id) },[]) return ( <> ({attendee.length ? attendee.name:""})

Name: {attendee.name}

Email: {attendee.email}

Gender: {attendee.gender}

Country: {attendee.country}

Job Title: {attendee.job_title}

Are you a member of the AfriLabs community?: {attendee.member_yes_no}

Organization: {attendee.organization}

Region: {attendee.region}

How long have you existed as a hub/organisation?: {attendee.time_in_organization}

What stakeholder group do you belong to?: {attendee.stake_holder_group}

Registered: {attendee.created_at}

 ) } export default DashboardAttendeesUser
